switch.cex.title: Not sending to CEX
switch.cex.description: I confirm that the destination of this transfer is not an unsupported exchange.
asset.external.badge.warning: This asset is registered as an external token. Always conduct your own research before trading.
asset.external.badge.danger: The creator of this asset has not revoked their admin rights. This means the supply can be minted, burned or frozen at any point. Proceed at your own risk.
